sentences: Loki on pahantahtoinen jumala skandinaavisessa mytologiassa.
Lokin teot usein johtivat katastrofeihin ja sekalaisuuteen.
Skandinaavissa tarinoissa Loki esiintyy usein petoksien ja juonittelujen jumalana.
context: In Finnish, 'loki' refers to Loki, the trickster god from Norse mythology. He is known for his cunning nature, ability to shape-shift, and causing both mischief and mayhem in the myths. In Finnish texts about mythology, this word would be used to identify this specific deity.
